meanings.definition: A person who paddles a canoe.
meanings.sent1: The canoeists glided smoothly across the lake.
meanings.sent2: Many canoeists enjoy exploring rivers and lakes.
meanings.sent3: The canoeists raced each other to the finish line, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of green trees, the canoeists were like tiny ants on a leaf.
meanings.sent5: The image of the canoeists paddling under the golden sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of canoeists setting up camp by the river.
meanings.sent2: The canoeists waved happily to us as they passed by.
meanings.sent3: The canoeists' colorful boats bobbed up and down in the gentle waves.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered as the canoeists crossed the finish line together.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed through the forest as the canoeists shared stories around the campfire.
